metadata.name: Suspicious Key Manager Access
metadata.comment: Detects the invocation of the Stored User Names and Passwords dialogue (Key Manager)

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\rundll32.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('rundll32.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('keymgr')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('krshowkeymgr')))

output.summary: Detects the invocation of the Stored User Names and Passwords dialogue (Key Manager)
